Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 by us, reflecting its unique features and the expertise poured into its creation. Given its unparalleled nature, we believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection or business. For you, we are offering this remarkable product at an exclusive price of $10000. We are confident that you will find its value exceeds the investment. Please let us know if you have any questions or need more information about the product. We look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
